name: Rummy
overview: Released as part of the Five-Star PD Games Pack 22 and created by Simon Preene. The objective is the collection of sets of cards which share some property. The game is for either two or three players. A game consists of a number of hands where each player tries achieve a score lower than that of the other competitors. Default rounds are set to 7, but can be modified. 7 cards are dealt to each player and they take turns. Each players tries to get rid of all the cards in their hand by forming sets of 3 or more cards and submitting them or by adding cards to sets already submitted. Sets must consiste of 3 to 7 cards sharing a common attribute.
